backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling access control, user profiles, and CRUD operations for publishers with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard alert requirements and associated frontend file dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/.env: Environment config defining the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React routing setup handling authentication and defining all application routes.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Condu: Modal form for creating and editing trained conductors with publisher selection and availability fields.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Delet: Confirmation dialog for deleting a trained conductor with pending‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component with sidebar, header, outlet for routes, and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header bar showing app title and logout button with mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive navigation sidebar with route links, active state handling, and mobile overlay.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing global notes with category and optional publisher attachment.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Card displaying note title, category badge, preview text, date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Modal for adding a pioneer by selecting an active publisher and service year.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a pioneer record with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Modal for editing a pioneer’s publisher and service year with prefilled data.
frontend/src/components/publicWitnessing: Confirmation dialog that deletes a trained publisher using a mutation and closes on success.
Modal for creating or editing a trained publisher, handling form state, validation, and save mutations.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Form modal for adding a new publisher with validation, privilege selection, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Delet: Empty placeholder file for deleting a publisher note.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal for editing an existing publisher, pre-filling fields and submitting updates via mutation.
Empty placeholder file for editing a publisher note.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Publi: Empty placeholder file for displaying an individual publisher note.
Empty placeholder file for listing or managing publisher notes.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal that loads an existing shepherding visit, validates input, and updates it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal for recording a new shepherding visit with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal form for creating a task with title, due date, category, notes, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal for editing an existing task, preloading task data, validating input, and submitting an update mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal for adding a new territory with number and type fields, validation, and createTerritory mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Table displaying sorted territory checkout records with dates, campaign status, and optional edit actions.
Modal to check out a territory by selecting a publisher and optional campaign flag, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog for deleting a territory note using a delete mutation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a territory checkout record, handling date conversions, form state, validation, and update mutation.
Modal for editing a territory’s number and type with validation and update mutation.
Modal for editing a single territory note and saving changes via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Card component displaying a territory note with edit and delete actions.
Section for creating, listing, sorting, editing, and deleting territory notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook for adding a publisher and mapping privilege selections to backend format.
Mutation hook to check out a territory and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook for creating global notes with validation and publisher attachment logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePioneer.ts: Mutation hook for creating a pioneer and invalidating the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateShepherdingV: Mutation hook for creating shepherding visits and refreshing the visits list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Provides a mutation to create a task through the actor and invalidates the tasks query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Creates a territory with a generated ID and refreshes the territories list after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedCondu: Adds a trained conductor via actor, invalidates related queries, and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedPubli: Adds a trained publisher and refreshes the list with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Deletes a global note and invalidates the globalNotes query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePioneer.ts: Deletes a pioneer and refreshes the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Deletes a publisher with optimistic updates and error rollback, then refetches publishers.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Deletes a task and triggers tasks refetch.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedCondu: Deletes a trained conductor with success/error toasts and invalidates the list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedPubli: Deletes a trained publisher and refreshes its list with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Provides queries to fetch all global notes or a specific note by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneers.ts: Fetches the full list of pioneers from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublisherNotes.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides queries to fetch all publishers or a single publisher by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceMeetingCond: Fetches all service meeting conductor assignments.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, updating, and deleting individual shepherding visits.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Fetches tasks filtered by status or a single task by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritories.ts: Fetches all territories from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Provides queries and mutations for retrieving, updating, deleting, and marking territories returned or available.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate territory notes with automatic cache invalidation.
Fetches all trained service meeting conductors using React Query.
Fetches all trained publishers via a simple React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Mutation hook to update a territory checkout record and invalidate related territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Updates a global note and refreshes the global notes query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Mutation for editing a pioneer and invalidating the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Updates publisher details, maps privileges, and invalidates the publishers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Updates a task and triggers refetch of all task-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Toggles task completion status and invalidates task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedCondu: Updates a trained conductor with success/error toasts and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedPubli: Updates a trained publisher and shows status toasts while invalidating queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme variables and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Simple placeholder page showing a construction icon and coming‑soon message.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page computing and displaying stats for publishers, territories, tasks, and shepherding visits.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProf: Displays details for a field service group, including leadership and sorted member list.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroups.ts: Displays field service groups with overseers, assistants, and sorted active publishers fetched from queries.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity with a loading state and styled button.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Manages global notes with category filtering, add/edit/delete modals, and sorted note display.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Shows a sortable pioneers table with add, edit, and delete modals tied to publisher data.
frontend/src/pages/PublicWitnessing.tsx: Lists trained publishers with sorting, authorization labels, and modals for adding, editing, and deleting.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Displays a publisher’s details with privilege badges and supports editing or deleting the profile.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Displays a publishers list with filtering, plus add, edit, and delete modals tied to query and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceMeetingConduct: Shows trained conductors in a sortable table with add, edit, and delete dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Manages shepherding visits with search, sorting, record/edit modals, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays a single shepherding visit with notes editing, visit editing, and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Lists tasks with filtering, completion toggling, and add/edit/delete modals integrated with task APIs.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Displays a territories list with status-based styling, checkout duration logic, and an add-territory modal trigger.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Shows detailed territory info with editing, checkout management, delete confirmation, and history display.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides timestamp formatting helpers for notes, tasks, checkouts, visits, weeks, and training dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, containers, and theme tokens with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the dashboard alerts feature, requirements, and current state.
